info.description: Permissions service stores user resources and allows to manage access to resources
info.title: Permissions API

put.summary: Assign access level for all user resources. Used for billing purposes.
Change access of group member to project namespaces.

delete.summary: Delete group permissions from project namespaces.

post.summary: Add permissions for user to project namespaces.

AddMemberToProjectRequest.description: AddMemberToProjectRequest contains parameters for adding user to project

AdminVolumeResizeRequest.description: AdminVolumeResizeRequest contains parameters for changing volume size as admin

AvailableSolution.description: AvailableSolution -- solution which user can run

BoundAccountDeleteRequest.description: BoundAccountDeleteRequest -- request to remove bound account

BoundAccounts.description: BoundAccounts -- bound accounts list for user

ChangeTariffRequest.description: ChangeTariffRequest contains parameters needed for tariff changing

ConfigMapData.description: ConfigMapData -- model for config map data

ConfigMapsList.description: ConfigMapsList -- model for config maps list

Container.description: Container -- model for container in deployment

ContainerPort.description: ContainerPort -- model for port in container

ContainerVolume.description: ContainerVolume -- volume (or config map) mounted in container

DeleteResourceAccessRequest.description: DeleteUserAccessRequest is a request object for deleting access to resource for user

solution_id.description: Solution ID (only if deployment is part of solution)

total_cpu.description: total CPU usage by all containers in this deployment

total_memory.description: total RAM usage by all containers in this deployment

DeploymentVersion.description: DeploymentVersion -- model for deployment version update

DirectVolumeCreateRequest.description: DirectVolumeCreateRequest is a request object for creating volume as admin (without billing)

Env.description: Env -- key-value pair of environment variables

Err.description:
Err -- standard serializable API error
Message -- constant error message:
+ "invalid username"
+ "quota exceeded"
+ "validation error"
...etc...
ID -- unique error identification code
Details -- optional context error messages kinda
+ "field 'Replicas' must be non-zero value"
+ "not enough tights to feed gopher"
+ "resource 'God' does't exist"
Fields -- optional set of key-value pairs

ErrSID.description: ErrSID -- represents service ID of error

Fields.description: Fields -- represents additional key-value fields of error

MassiveUnsubscribeTariffRequest.description: MassiveUnsubscribeTariffRequest contains parameters needed for all tariffs unsubscribing

NamespaceAdminCreateRequest.description: NamespaceAdminCreateRequest contains parameters for creating namespace without billing

NamespaceAdminResizeRequest.description: NamespaceAdminResizeRequest contains parameter for resizing namespace without billing

NamespaceCreateRequest.description: NamespaceCreateRequest contains parameters for creating namespace

NamespaceRenameRequest.description: NamespaceRenameRequest contains parameters for renaming namespace

NamespaceResizeRequest.description: NamespaceResizeRequest contains parameters for changing namespace quota

NamespaceTariff.description:
NamespaceTariff represents billing tariff for namespace
If VolumeSize provided non-persistent volume will be created.

NamespaceWithPermissions.description: NamespaceWithPermissions is a response object for get requests

Permission.description: Permission represents information about user permission to resource

total_cpu.description: total CPU usage by all containers in this pod

total_memory.description: total RAM usage by all containers in this pod

start_at.description: pod start date in RFC3339 format

ProjectAddGroupRequest.description: ProjectAddGroupRequest contains parameters for adding permissions for group

ProjectCreateRequest.description: ProjectCreateRequest contains parameters for creating project

Protocol.description: represents port protocol type (TCP or UDP)

RegisterRequest.description: RegisterRequest -- request to create new user

RenameRequest.description: RenameRequest contains parameters needed for resource renaming

Resource.description: Resource -- represents namespace CPU and RAM

Resources.title: Resources -- represents namespace limits and user resources.

RunSolutionResponse.description: RunSolutionResponse -- response to run solution request

SelectedConfigMapsList.description: SelectedConfigMapsList -- model for config maps list from all namespaces

SelectedIngressesList.description: SelectedIngressesList -- model for ingresses list from all namespaces

solution_id.description: Solution ID (only if service is part of solution)

SetGroupMemberAccessRequest.description: SetGroupMemberAccessRequest contains parameters for setting access to member of group

SetResourceAccessRequest.description: SetUserAccessRequest is a request object for setting access to resource for user

SetResourcesAccessesRequest.description: SetUserAccessRequest is a request object for setting user accesses

SubscribeTariffRequest.description: SubscribeTariffRequest contains parameters needed for tariff subscribing

UpdateImage.description: UpdateImage -- model for update container image request

UpdateReplicas.description: UpdateReplicas -- contains new number of replicas

UpdateStorageRequest.description: UpdateStorageRequest represents request object for updating storage

UserGroupMembers.description: UserGroupMembers -- list of user group members

UserHeaderData.description: represents header data for X-User-Namespace and X-User-Volume headers (encoded in base64)

UserLogin.description: UserList -- model for user login, password and id

Version.description: Version represents a semver compatible version

VolumeCreateRequest.description: VolumeCreateRequest is a request object for creating volume

VolumeRenameRequest.description: VolumeRenameRequest is a request object for renaming volume

VolumeResizeRequest.description: VolumeResizeRequest contains parameters for changing volume size

VolumeTariff.description: VolumeTariff represents billing tariff for (persistent) volume

Filters.description: A set of filters separated with comma. See "dao" package for more information.
Filters.name: filter
